column5: Anyone familiar with Duroboats? I have a 15' Duroboat (no rivets) that has developed a leak along the keel (possibly from poor trailering). Attempts to locate the leak by putting water in the boat have produced only a slight drip in the transom area but in the water it takes water on fairly fast (maybe 2 gallon per hour). Any ideas out there?

It would probably be worth your time to contact the manufacturer and ask them for advice as this boat is kind of uncommon among fisherman in midwest- I think they build that boat on the west coast- Try to find the manufacturer on the internet.
